author: Tim Hume, Michael Learmonth
title: Spain Is Creating Isolation Facilities For ‘Silent Carriers’ of Coronavirus
description: The plan depends on testing millions of people to assure that the country can ease the lockdown without COVID-19 raging back.
content:
Spains coronavirus lockdown appears to be paying off, with the number of new deaths falling for the fourth consecutive day Monday. 
Now, as the government looks to ease the lockdown, its announced plans to isolate asymptomatic silent carriers of the virus in… [+4788 chars]
